title: Error in building 0.3.0 in macOS High Sierra
body_html:
I got the following error in buidling pytorch 0.3.0 in macOS High Sierra (10.13.1) by using Xcode 8.2.1, CUDA 8, and magma 2.3.0

~/Desktop/pytorch_build/pytorch ‣ MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py bdist_wheel

... ... ...

[ 26%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCSortUtils.cu.o
[ 28%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCTensorSort.cu.o
[ 29%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCTensorScatterGather.cu.o
/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

2 errors detected in the compilation of "/var/folders/4f/97nl_7m55ydcm83p2dplq93h0000gn/T//tmpxft_0000be8c_00000000-17_THCBlas.compute_61.cpp1.ii".
2 errors detected in the compilation of "/var/folders/4f/97nl_7m55ydcm83p2dplq93h0000gn/T//tmpxft_0000be8b_00000000-17_THCSleep.compute_61.cpp1.ii".
/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

CMake Error at THC_generated_THCBlas.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
  Error generating file
  /Users/shhong/Desktop/pytorch_build/pytorch/torch/lib/build/THC/CMakeFiles/THC.dir//./THC_generated_THCBlas.cu.o


make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCBlas.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

... ... ...

Any idea?

body:
I got the following error in buidling pytorch 0.3.0 in macOS High Sierra (10.13.1) by using Xcode 8.2.1, CUDA 8, and magma 2.3.0

```
~/Desktop/pytorch_build/pytorch ‣ MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py bdist_wheel

... ... ...

[ 26%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCSortUtils.cu.o
[ 28%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCTensorSort.cu.o
[ 29%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCTensorScatterGather.cu.o
/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

2 errors detected in the compilation of "/var/folders/4f/97nl_7m55ydcm83p2dplq93h0000gn/T//tmpxft_0000be8c_00000000-17_THCBlas.compute_61.cpp1.ii".
2 errors detected in the compilation of "/var/folders/4f/97nl_7m55ydcm83p2dplq93h0000gn/T//tmpxft_0000be8b_00000000-17_THCSleep.compute_61.cpp1.ii".
/usr/include/string.h(170): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

/usr/include/string.h(171): error: extra text after expected end of number

CMake Error at THC_generated_THCBlas.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
  Error generating file
  /Users/shhong/Desktop/pytorch_build/pytorch/torch/lib/build/THC/CMakeFiles/THC.dir//./THC_generated_THCBlas.cu.o


make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCBlas.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

... ... ...
```

Any idea?
